title: this is a shoutout
body: GraveLord i met u on here i added u u were so nice to me then we gifted each other basically each week XD you are one of my good friends i hope the best in your life your are my #1 friend you will always be my number 1 friend you will have good fortune not 'misfortune' ha hhahahahah M8Y anyway axe your a close friend to me as i really like how u let me do what i wanna do so axe aka grave lord u better kill them gankers in danksouls

replies.body: Thanks heaps man! Thats very lovely of you! Its fun haha been playing a lot of Bloodborne lately haha, Getting my dodge on!
